name: Three Blind Mice
description:
Three Blind Mice is an action memory  game. Tap a sequence of movement commands within a time limit, then watch your mouse follow the commands to collect cheese, avoid traps, and make it safely to the next mouse hole.

Warning! This game has some known audio and crash bugs. 

Three Blind Mice was created by Pat Kemp. Powered by Flixel.

Kongregate page: https://www.kongregate.com/games/knivel/three-blind-mice

Newgrounds page: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/557629
